    		Technology and Accessibility Services
    	Chico State is dedicated to providing a digital environment that is accessible to everyone and usable by all.Website servicesWeb Services supports the production of high-quality web pages. We specialize in support for people who manage department, division, unit or program sites on csuchico.edu.Accessible technology servicesAccessible technology services specializes in website accessibility, assistive technology, and alternative format materials. We help people create accessible content (text, images, video, etc.) by providing service, training, and consultation.Accessible Technology InitiativeRead about Chico State’s ATI priorities and the policies that guide our work.Submit a ticketExplore our service ticket catalog if you need help or have a work request.What does EQUITY and INCLUSION mean?Equity refers to the principle of fairness and justice in the distribution of resources, opportunities, and privileges. Equity aims to address and correct historical and systemic injustices and ensure that everyone has the opportunity to succeed.Inclusion refers to a state of being valued, respected, and supported. It’s about focusing on the needs of every individual and ensuring the right conditions are in place for each person to achieve their full potential.Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeMore in our divisionComputing & Communication ServicesCreative Media & TechnologyEnterprise ApplicationsInformation SecurityInstitutional Research and Strategic Analytics (IRSA)IT Administrative ServiceIT Support ServicesTechnology Equity and Inclusion
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
